characteristics.name: Primordial State
characteristics.description: The condition before creation, the undifferentiated totality

characteristics.name: Infinite Potential
characteristics.description: All possibilities existing in latent form

characteristics.name: Darkness
characteristics.description: The void before light, the absence that precedes presence

characteristics.name: Abyss
characteristics.description: Unfathomable depths containing unknown terrors and treasures

characteristics.name: Dissolution
characteristics.description: The return to formlessness, breaking down of order

characteristics.name: Creative Matrix
characteristics.description: The fertile chaos from which new forms emerge

characteristics.name: Terror
characteristics.description: The overwhelming experience of facing the formless

characteristics.name: Freedom
characteristics.description: Liberation from all constraints and definitions

characteristics.name: Unknowable
characteristics.description: Beyond comprehension, defying all categories and concepts
